scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, wearing a crown of thorns and a loincloth. Blood streams from his wounds. To the left, the Virgin Mary, draped in blue, is supported by another woman in red, both appearing distressed. To the right, a figure in a red robe, possibly Saint John the Evangelist, holds a book and gestures towards the cross. In the background, a rocky landscape is visible, with a fortified building resembling a castle or walled city in the distance. The scene is framed by a decorative golden border.
